title: Calories in a Cosmic Brownie
meta_description: Discover calories in cosmic brownie, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, and easy tweaks for this Little Debbie treat.
assumptions: Little Debbie Cosmic Brownie, standard single serving (approx. 57g), chocolate base with fudge icing and candy-coated chocolate pieces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, size, and storage; values based on typical packaged product. Check labels for exact info.

quick_answer.text: One Cosmic Brownie packs about 360 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: Approximately 360 kcal for a standard Little Debbie Cosmic Brownie.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: About 48 g total carbs, including 32 g sugars and 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a cosmic brownie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 18 g total fat per brownie, with 8 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: Only about 2 g protein per serving.

faqs.q: Calories in cosmic brownie vs. other snacks?
faqs.a: Similar to a candy bar; higher than fruit but treat-like indulgence.
